text: The Medievil 2 will be a disappointed, no doubt. It jumped to very different themes than the first one, and it totally lost that feeling of magical world. author: XMobius1xx

text:
Funny, I was lsitening to this trac earlier today.  It is one of my absolute favourites.  Thanks Supradarky, you need at least one Medievil song in your vgm list to make it perfect.  Seriously though, I was actively searching for this song to listen to just a few hours ago.

The psp version wasn't all that good in dialoge, but people gotta stop compaining about the music in it.  The remake's soundtrack deserves a look too.  Gallowmear Waltz fot instance.

text: I loved this game. I'm a sucker for games with horror/halloween atmosphere. I remember this theme very well, mainly the piano's looping melody. It fits the "haunted ruins" image perfectly well. I haven't played the second or the PSP game yet though, but I'll get to that someday.
